abstract: Daewoo Electronics creditors have selected five preliminary candidates to buy the appliance maker, local media reported on Thursday.
snippet: Daewoo Electronics creditors have selected five preliminary candidates to buy the appliance maker, local media reported on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Daewoo Electronics creditors have selected five candidates to buy the appliance maker in a preliminary bidding, Reuters reported citing a local media report on Thursday.

headline.main: Daewoo Bidders Could Include Electrolux and Ripplewood
